poem:
"Vignettes of the Venetian Protest"

The buzz of unrest
in the Serenísima -
tourists cloud, pollute,
drink dry the liquescent city.

Barcelona dreams green -
a hope tinged with finance and thirst.

A dual remedy;
whispers of
responsibility in the euro's glint.  

But in Venice,
the canals sigh,
bearing witness to the weight and waste
of wanderlust in excess.
